0.3.0.name: wordpress/ga-pvcounter
0.3.0.description:
It is a widget that uses the data of google analytics, to view the page views chart and rankings of popular posts.

  • The display in the tab switching the popular posts and page views (Today / 7days / 30days / 1year) by period.
  • Device-specific(desktop / mobile / tablet)　page view count chart display.
  • The display of only the page view count chart. (Popular posts is not needed)
  • View Popular posts via short code to an article in.

Other parameters : Minimum query interval (minutes), Short code for use in Text Widget, ...

日本語の説明
